document.full_text: cuba readied for a communist party congress about its future with a tribute to the past on saturday, staging a military parade for the 50th anniversaries of the u.s.-backed bay of pigs invasion and the declaration of cuban socialism.
document.title: cuba stages military parade ahead of key congress
lines_and_colors: cuba readied for a communist party congress about its future with a tribute to the past on saturday, staging a military parade for the 50th anniversaries of the u.s.-backed bay of pigs invasion and the declaration of cuban socialism.
